TransitionProcessor module

class TransitionProcessor.TransitionProcessor(data, log=True, non_stop=True, time_out=0)[source]

Bases: MiniTimer

Processes transitions for a finite state machine, including checking for determinism, action consistency, and transforming FSM transitions into Z3 solver format.

Inherits from MiniTimer for performance measurement.

a_consistency_check(preC, _postC_A, otherPrecs, inputs)[source]

Generates a formula for action consistency check (AConsistencyCheck formula generation). AConsistency Check Implementation

Parameters:

  • preC (str) – The precondition string.

  • _postC_A (str) – The postcondition string after processing.

  • otherPrecs (list) – List of other preconditions.

  • inputs (list) – List of input strings.

Returns:

The generated consistency check formula.

Return type:

str

add_old_var_from_precs_and_inputs(otherPrecs, inputs)[source]

Adds ‘_old’ suffix to variables based on preconditions and inputs.

Parameters:

  • otherPrecs (list) – List of precondition strings.

  • inputs (list) – List of input strings.

Returns:

Updated list of input strings with ‘_old’ variables added.

Return type:

list

append(str)[source]

Appends a string to the internal code model, helping to start building the Z3 model progressively.

Parameters:

str (str) – The string to append.

get_vars_names_from_input(input_c)[source]

Extracts variable names from the input condition.

Parameters:

input_c (str) – The input condition string.

Returns:

A dictionary of variable names extracted.

Return type:

dict

n_det_check(curent_transition, other_transitions, processed_data)[source]

Generates a formula to check for determinism at a specific stage (NDetCheck formula generation). NdetCheck Implementation

Parameters:

  • current_transition (dict) – The current transition being processed.

  • other_transitions (list) – List of other transitions.

  • processed_data (tuple) – Processed data for determinism check.

Returns:

The generated determinism check formula.

Return type:

str

process(transition, outgoingTransitions)[source]

Processes a transition and outgoing transitions for solver compatibility.

Parameters:

  • transition (dict) – The current transition to process.

  • outgoingTransitions (list) – List of outgoing transitions.

quantifier_closure(formula, variables=[], quantifier='ForAll')[source]

Applies a quantifier to a formula with specified variables.

Parameters:

  • formula (str) – The logical formula to apply the quantifier to.

  • variables (list) – List of variables to include in the quantification.

  • quantifier (str) – The type of quantifier (‘ForAll’ or ‘Exists’).

Returns:

The formula with the quantifier applied.

Return type:

str

should_stop(formula, transition, participant)[source]

Determines whether processing should stop based on the given formula.

Parameters:

  • formula (str) – The formula to evaluate.

  • transition (dict) – The current transition data.

  • participant (str) – The participant involved.

Returns:

True if processing should stop, False otherwise.

Return type:

bool
